amendment.description: Amendment sought to add language to the bill to control crop insurance program costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to comprehensively reform the federal crop insurance program, including the Administration's farm bill crop insurance proposals. The amendment saves approximately $4 billion while adding resources to the Grassland Reserve Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cooper amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250, 1 Present (Roll no. 754).
